title: High-fidelity synthesis of microhole templates with low-surface-energy-enabled self-releasing photolithography
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,12125-12130
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00660G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Peipei Jia, Shaolin Zhou, Xiaobing Cai, Qiuquan Guo, Haoran Niu, Wenping Ning, Yong Sun, Dongxing Zhang
A self-releasing photolithographic technique is developed to synthesize freestanding polymeric templates with high structural fidelity, smooth surfaces and excellent flexibility.
